alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 23 at 12:11PM EST until February 24 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central New York, including the following county, Warren. * WHEN...Until 815 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1208 PM EST, emergency management confirmed that Route 418 (River Street) between Hickory Hill Road and River Road remains closed in both directions in the adjoining towns of Warrensburg and Thurman due to ongoing flooding from an ice jam. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Warrensburg, Thurman Station and Athol. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
